member.name: T:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section
member.summary: Define a single section of a document

member.summary: Creates a new instance of this class

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.SignatureStatus
member.summary: Define allowed operations when there is signature

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.Pages
member.summary: Contains one or more pages of the document, if there are pages available.
member.remarks: Note that not all pages are necessarily listed here; it depends on the server's choice. However you still can get all pages of a document when you follow the links specified in the Pages date.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.Thumbnails
member.summary: Similar to Pages, but contains only links and page number.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.FileChunk
member.summary: Contains data for a file chunk during a big file upload. This data is created on the server of every chunk request.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.Id
member.summary: Identity of the section

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.ContentType
member.summary: The Internet media type of the section. If there is no section this value is missing.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.HaveMorePages
member.summary: Contains true if all pages are known so PageCount contains exact number the pages in section. If the value is set to false there are more pagesm but at least the number set in PageCount

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.PageCount
member.summary: The number of pages of this section, if known. If it is unknown, this value is -1.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.FileSize
member.summary: The size of the file in bytes.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.OriginalFileName
member.summary: Original file name with extension

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.ContentModified
member.summary: Time when content is last modified

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.HasTextAnnotation
member.summary: Contains true if the section has text annotation.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.Section.DocumentRelationLink
member.summary: Gets the Uri of the link for the relation document.
member.remarks: Returns the uri of the link for the relation document if it exists, or null if this link does not exist. The returned link can be absolute or relative. If it is a relative link you must set it in the right context yourself.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.DialogExpressionCondition.Value
member.summary: Specifies the value or the expression of the dialog field.
member.remarks: If a single value is specified then a exact search (or wild card search) is performed.
If two values are specified then the condition denotes a range search.
In case of two values where the first one is null a "less or equal than" search is performed. If the second value is null a "greater or equal than" search is performed.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PageData.LowQualitySize
member.summary: Gets or sets the low quality level.
member.remarks: The low quality size is the size in pixels which a client can use for displaying a document before starting using the deep zoom control. A client should not request any levels with less resolution than defined by this value because the quality of the level defined by this value is the best also for lower levels.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PageData.TileSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the recommented size of multi scale image tiles.
member.remarks: If a client decides to display the rendered page as multi scale image (using the Deep Zoom technology) this value gives a hint for the recommented size of the tiles.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PageData.RenderedImageFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the preferred format this page is rendered.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PageData.ContentArea
member.summary: Gets or sets the area of the content of the page. The coordinates are in twips (1/1440 inches) - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twip .
member.remarks: The content of a page is the part where the text resided. If the page is blank or the server cannot determine such an area the rectangle should contain the entire page.
If this field is null the server has not yet calculated the size of this page.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PageData.DpiX
member.summary: Gets the horizontal resolution of a page image. In case of vector images this is the maximal resolution which can be rendered.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PageData.DpiY
member.summary: Gets the vertical resolution of a page image. In case of vector images this is the maximal resolution which can be rendered.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PageData.Width
member.summary: Gets the horizontal size of a page image in pixels. In case of vector images this is the maximal pixel width which can be rendered.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PageData.Height
member.summary: Gets the vertical size of a page image in pixels. In case of vector images this is the maximal pixel height which can be rendered.

member.name: T:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.PlatformImageFormat
member.summary: Define a supported image formats in platform

member.name: T:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownload
member.summary: Define how a document can be downloaded

member.name: M:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownload.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of this class

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownload.TargetFileType
member.summary: Specifies the target format (target file type) of the downloaded file.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownload.DirectDownload
member.summary: If this flag is true then the file is directly downloaded, even if the browser provides a plugin for this file.
member.remarks: If you have a browser plugin installed which shows you the content a PDF file in the browser directly then this flag can be used to override this behaviour and let the browser open a "Save file" box.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownload.AutoPrint
member.summary: If this flag is true then the PDF will have a script which opens the print dialog immediately.
member.remarks: This flag applies only to the PDF target format.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownload.SendByEmail
member.summary: This flag should be true if the document will be sent by email.
member.remarks: This flag applies only to the PDF target format.

member.name: T:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownloadType
member.summary: Define the format that will be used to download a document

member.name: F:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownloadType.Auto
member.summary: The type of the downloaded file determined by the server automatically. In case of a single file this is directly downloaded, otherwise a ZIP file is created.

member.name: F:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownloadType.Zip
member.summary: The files are always downloaded as ZIP file.

member.name: F:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownloadType.PDF
member.summary: The files are always downloaded as PDF file. If more than one document is downloaded then every document is converted to PDF and the PDF files are packed in a ZIP file.

member.name: T:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownloadBase
member.summary: Define how a page of a document can be downloaded

member.name: M:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownloadBase.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of this class

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownloadBase.Layers
member.summary: Specifies the annotation layers to be included in the output file.
member.remarks: This list is used only when KeepAnnotations flag is set to true; if this flag is set to false, then this list is ignored and no layers are included. In order to keep all layers, just set KeepAnnotations to true and pass an empty list or do not specify a list at all.
This flag applies only to the PDF target format.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.FileDownloadBase.KeepAnnotations
member.summary: If this flag is true then the annotations are rendered in the PDF file, otherwise the annotations are removed.
member.remarks: This flag applies only to the PDF target format.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.LockInfo.Interval
member.summary: Define the lifetime interval for the lock. This parameter contains a time interval specification in the form: [ws][-]{ d | [d.]hh:mm[:ss[.ff]] }[ws] Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. One selection from the list of alternatives enclosed in braces ({ and }) and separated by vertical bars (|) is required. For more details check http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/se73z7b9.aspx

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.LockInfo.Operation
member.summary: Optional arbitrary string that define the purpose of the lock operation. Only one operation will successfully apply a lock on one document at same time.

member.name: T:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.AdhocRenderingQuery
member.summary: Specifies how a file is to be rendered.
member.remarks: You can specify either a canvas size (in pixels) or a resolution (in dpi) of the rendered bitmap. In case you specify the canvas size the rendered bitmap fits into the canvas while the page ratio is preserved.
In case you do not specify the size or resolution a default rendering resolution of 72 dpi is assumed.

member.name: P:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.TokenDescription.Lifetime
member.summary: Lifetime of the token. After lifetime expires token cannot be used anymore. This parameter contains a time interval specification in the form: [ws][-]{ d | [d.]hh:mm[:ss[.ff]] }[ws] Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. One selection from the list of alternatives enclosed in braces ({ and }) and separated by vertical bars (|) is required. For more details check http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/se73z7b9.aspx

member.name: F:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.ResultDialogFunctionType.EMailReply
member.summary: The function for creating a reply email to an email that is stored in DocuWare. If this function is used in the result list, the email client, e.g. Outlook, opens with a normal reply email.

member.name: F:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.ResultDialogFunctionType.EMailReplyAll
member.summary: The function for creating a reply email to all parties for an email that is stored in DocuWare. If this function is used in the result list, the email client, e.g. Outlook, opens with a normal reply-to-all email.

member.name: F:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.ResultDialogFunctionType.EMailForward

member.name: M:DocuWare.Platform.ServerClient.ServiceConnection.SetHostId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the identifier of the machine the .NET API client is running.
member.param: The host identifier.
member.remarks: The host identifier is used by the license management to faster reuse licenses for users working on the same machine. In a .NET or Mono environment the host identifier is automatically set. If you are in a different environment, you should explicitely set the host identifier by calling this function during the initialization phase of your application.
